column1: The Pit Room////Everything here was home made and hand done.  I could have eaten the home made pickles only and been happy
column2: they were so good.  This place provides not only pickled jalepenos but raw sliced (non-pickled) if you prefer.   In terms of onion
column3: some bbq places do sliced white
column4: some do sliced and pickled red
column5: this place does both.   They get it.
